snippet.title: 『Candlelight: Lament』Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
This is a Lovecraftian horror, Point and Click adventure game.
Ed broke the curfew to visit his friends in order to find out the truth of his granddaughter's disappearance, but the truth was far more terrible than he thought.
Steam Store Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2356330/Candlelight_Lament/

#indiegame #games
